page.title: 04MY SCHOOL - ST.MARY'S
page.content: The{school}stands on about six acres of land. My school is good. We have 4 female{teachers.}Mr. Saddington is the headmaster. Mrs. Ruddock is his secretary. She does first aid too. The school supplies us with pencils, books pens, buses to get to school. My favourite lessons are art, maths, swimming & English. My worst lesson is FRENCH. This year the 4th.years will be leaving & if nothing goes wrong I will be the oldest in the school, not including teachers. We have 154 pupils. It is not a very large school. Carlton Holy Family is the school we go into next. The oldest pupil is 11 and the youngest 4. We have 2 play times the infants have 3. School starts at 9.10am and finishes at 3.20pm. School dinners are reasonable. I have packed lunch. 98 others do as well, 41 have dinners.{Nicola Howley
